org.trianacode.gui.windows

Class Help

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.windows.Help

  • public class Help
extends java.lang.Object
    This pulls up a Ved - a Triana Editor and puts the help information in it. The user gives the filename of the helpfile and Ved displays it.
